#summary some ideas for the next releases of specs

= Lift integration =

This is a big topic. The idea is to making the specification and testing of [http://code.google.com/p/liftweb lift] applications as easy and integrated as possible.

= A web application to create and run literal specifications =

This project is related to the first as it should be a good way to experiment on testing a _lift_ application.

But the general purpose of that project is to provide a wiki interface to business users, sot that they can write specifications, being directly stored a executable Scala LiteralSpecification objects. This will allow developers to add the behavior necessary to connect the specification to the application.
